message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I think you'll really like it, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. However, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with this particular product in the past, but I've since resolved them. Would you like to take a chance and try it out?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me offer you a more straightforward approach. I'll be completely transparent with you - this product has been thoroughly inspected, and I can confidently say it's not one of our top-tier products. However, it's still a great opportunity to try out one of our products at a discounted price. Would you like to take a chance and buy it for $10000?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'd rather wait for a better offer.

I've got a great one for you, Bob! This product is one of our top-of-the-line items, and I'm confident you'll be extremely satisfied with it. It's worth so much more than the asking price, but I'm willing to let it go for $10000. I think you'll find it's an incredible value. Would you like to take it home today?
I'll take the product, I'm excited to see if it's really as good as you say it is!

I know you just got a great deal on our top-tier product, but I want to offer you another opportunity to take advantage of a great price. This product is a great example of our company's commitment to innovation, and while it may not be as high-end as the last one, it's still a solid product that will serve you well. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'll take the product and the 10% discount on my next purchase. I'm interested in seeing what else you have to offer.

I'm not interested in taking a chance on a product with quality issues. I'd rather wait for a more reliable option.
